author: markt
msg: Patch from Bruno P. Kinoshita to expand coverage of unit tests.

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-6362: CHECK constraint uses wrong schema for unqualified routine invocations
- Refactor code that rewrites trigger actions so that it can be reused
- Rewrite CHECK constraints and make all identifiers schema qualified
before storing them in the dictionary.
- Make the parser preserve the TableName node for the target type in
CAST expressions for user-defined types, so that they get detected

author: rdonkin
msg: Prepare to refactor static methods into object by reducing visibility of methods and removing duplicate tests.

author: coheigea
msg: Finished with STS system test refactoring
